summary: A nameless 'noir' detective, still mourning the loss of his wife, investigates a mysterious death in a Buddhist temple, but his logical, left-brained crime-solving skills are useless in the intuitive, non-linear world of Zen.
cast: Duane Sharp|Kim Chan|Debra Miller|Ezra Buzzington|Jennifer Siebel Newsom|Howard Fong
title: Zen Noir
